People who are calling it worst have lost the plot. This is not Ronald Emerich's Independence Day with mindless action. You can relate the events in the film to the events that happened in District Six, Cape Town during 50s. And also to the Illegal immigrants' situation at US - Mexico border. The acting performances are so strong that the movie leaves a 'drama' kind of effect on the audience. Also, the perspective of the narration is exellent. Special Effects are cutting edge, and above all its the story telling at its best.
